title: Leaver Buster
body:
I DC'd from 2 games in a week because I got a work call outs and was given 5 games at 10 minutes lower priority. I waited my 10 minutes and played my 5 games only to just play my first non low priority game and disconnect due to an ISP failure. I was able to reconnect but 10 minutes late. We lost the game and I am now in a 20 minute lower priority queue. Why? I reconnected to the game and made an attempt at winning it. I did not self willingly disconnect from my last game my internet service provider failed and I still made it back only to play 20 minutes, lose and then be placed in to the low priority queue with a higher ban timer. How is this fair?
a response from a Red would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Seems really unfair, I know, but if Riot decide to make exceptions like this slide then trolls and toxic players will just use this as an excuse to whenever they purposefully disconnect from a game.

Right now, the Leavebuster system is doing a (overly) great job of discouraging people from disconnecting from games.
